text: Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt is a 2010 anime made by Gainax. It is about two angels who defeat ghosts and collect Heaven coins. ==Characters== * Panty Anarchy (voiced by Arisa Osagawara and Jamie Marchi) * Stocking Anarchy (voiced by Monica Rial) * Garterbelt (voiced by Christopher Sabat) * Briefers Rock (voiced by Joel McDonald) * Scanty (voiced by Colleen Clinkenbeard) * Kneesocks (voiced by Cherami Leigh) ==Production== The staff at Gainax were inspired by Drawn Together to make a raunchy anime. title: Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt
